Title: We Made It Through the Night
Writer: Jason Katims (developed by), Jason Katims, Lowell Ganz (based on the characters created by), Babaloo Mandel (based on the characters created by), Ron Howard (based on the characters created by)
Actors: Peter Krause, Lauren Graham, Dax Shepard, Monica Potter
Plot: A decision is made regarding Zeke's health; Sarah makes a decision and shares news with her father; tension deepens between Adam and Crosby; labor pains send Amber to the hospital.
